## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description           | Type                   | Default |
| --------------- | --------------- | --------------------- | ---------------------- | ------- |
| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate` | Indeterminate state   | `boolean`              | `false` |
| `max`           | `max`           | Max value             | `number`               | `100`   |
| `showValue`     | `show-value`    | Show value text       | `boolean`              | `false` |
| `size`          | `size`          | Size                  | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm"` | `'md'`  |
| `value`         | `value`         | Current value (0-100) | `number`               | `0`     |
| `variant`       | `variant`       | Visual variant        | `"bar" \| "circle"`    | `'bar'` |
